sentence.Network_en: Horst, a German from Hamburg, was a true original.
sentence.Network_cn: 来自德国汉堡的霍斯特是个名副其实的怪人。

sentence.Network_en: I went down immediately , of course , and that fool, Horst , aimed a fire extinguisher at me.
sentence.Network_cn: 但那个傻瓜 霍斯特 把灭火器对准了我.

sentence.Network_en: He has written to Horst K & ouml; hler , Germany's president, to ask for earlier clemency.
sentence.Network_cn: 为此,他给德国总统霍斯特?科勒(HorstK & ouml; hler)写信, 请求后者的宽大处理.
